item.title: Post: make publish
item.description: The Note list pages are paginated now, at least until I come up with a better approach. Plus I think the site has an automatic publish/announce flow now, after a few weeks of futzing around in my free time. Letâ€™s find out.
item.content:encoded:
The Note list pages are paginated now, at least until I come up with a better approach. Plus I think the site has an automatic publish/announce flow now, after a few weeks of futzing around in my free time.

Let’s find out.
